								Home
								



			
					
				Odoo ERP			
					
		
		
	
Odoo ERP Sales, Productivity, OperationsEnterprise Resource Planning (ERP) is one of the most in demand management systems for processing the routine transactions of a business organization. It uses ERP software along with cloud technologies in processing the inflow of the data. It processes the voluminous data and presents it in the required format for easy comprehension and decision-making. The process will save time and money and enhance the productivity of your organisation.
Odoo's ERP efficiently manages your business, allowing you to streamline all your business operations across multiple departments.
Sales & Services -  Enhance sales and service capabilities with functionalities beyond core order management.Inventory -  Gain advanced inventory management tools for production environments.Website -  Build and manage a user-friendly website for your business.Human Resources -  Manage employee recruitment, performance reviews, and payroll processes.Accounting - Extend accounting features beyond core functionalities for more complex financial management.Manufacturing -  Manage production processes, plan materials requirements, and track manufacturing workflows.Marketing -  Automate marketing campaigns, manage leads, and track marketing performance.Productivity - Improve team collaboration and communication with productivity tools.Themes -  Customize the look and feel of your Odoo interface.

Enquiry NowSales & Customer Management









Sales & Order Reporting

Gain insights into sales performance with detailed reports that track overall sales volume, top-selling products, and sales trends.
Identify top-selling products through data-driven insights to refine product offerings and strategies.
Monitor sales team effectiveness by tracking individual or team performance metrics to optimize strategies and identify areas for improvement.

Customer Management

Create and maintain comprehensive customer profiles for effective relationship management.
Track purchase history to understand customer buying patterns and preferences, facilitating personalised marketing efforts.
Analyze customer behavior to identify trends and segment the audience for targeted marketing campaigns.












Get Free ConsultationPoint of Sale (POS)Efficiently process customer transactions, including sales registration, cash handling, and receipt printing.
Track sales activity accurately by opening and closing sales sessions.
Accept various payment methods to provide flexibility to customers.
Manage customer profiles directly from the POS interface for an efficient checkout experience.

Let's Get StartedInvoicing & Accounting









Create custom invoices with detailed product breakdowns and tax calculations for accurate billing.
Issue credit notes for product returns or cancellations to maintain precise financial records.
Track incoming customer payments and outgoing vendor payments for effective cash flow management.
Generate and manage bills payable to vendors for purchases.
Manage various financial aspects of the business, including journal entries, bank reconciliations, general ledger maintenance, and partner ledger access.











Let's consultPurchases & Inventory ManagementPurchase Management -  Create requests for quotations, manage purchase orders, and track vendor performance.
Inventory Operations -  Perform inventory transfers, product replenishment, inventory adjustments, manage product scrapping, and schedule automated inventory tasks.
Inventory Reporting & Configuration -  Generate detailed inventory reports, forecast inventory levels, analyze inventory valuation, and track product movement. Configure warehouse settings, manage operation types, product categories, and set up reordering rules to maintain optimal stock levels.

Let's Onboard
